game.name: Coco Block
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud
game.shortDescription: Coconuts drop from above – click to block them before they bonk your monkeys. Bananas fall too – let the monkeys eat them for points and combos. The longer you keep the monkeys safe and feed them bananas, the faster the coconuts fall. How high can you score?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Coconuts drop from above – click to block them before they bonk your monkeys. Bananas fall too – let the monkeys eat them for points and combos. The longer you keep the monkeys safe and feed them bananas, the faster the coconuts fall. How high can you score?
